metadata.title: CVE-2021-2279 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). The supported version that is affected is Prior to6.1.20. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attackerwith network access via RDP to compromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. Successfulattacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle VMVirtualBox. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 8.1 (Confidentiality, Integrity andAvailability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
